mapper.select: select product_id, product_name , product_img, price, brand ,tc.top_category_id , top_name from product p , top_category tc where p.top_category_id = tc.top_category_id order by product_id desc
select * from product order by product_id desc limit 4;

select product_id, product_name , product_img, price, brand ,tc.top_category_id , top_name , product_inven , product_detail from product p , top_category tc where p.top_category_id = tc.top_category_id and product_id = #{product_id}
select p.top_category_id, tc.top_name, COUNT(tc.top_name) as cnt from product p, top_category tc WHERE p.top_category_id = tc.top_category_id group by p.top_category_id, tc.top_name ;
mapper.insert: insert into product(top_category_id, product_name, product_detail, price, brand, product_inven, product_img) values (#{top_category_id}, #{product_name}, #{product_detail}, #{price}, #{brand}, #{product_inven},#{product_img})
mapper.select: select COUNT(product_id) as cnt from product where regdate >=(CURDATE()-INTERVAL #{days} DAY)
